availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James E. Wright (Russellville, county court clerk)

body.p: Russellville, Kentucky, county court clerk. Missouri native. Married to Sally A. Robertson Wright on January 13, 1848. Father of William M. Wright. Resident in Russellville in 1850. Logan County Court Clerk from 1860 to 1864. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Russellville, p. 135A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Russellville, p. 115.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Russellville, p. 24.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Russellville, p. 3.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 000364550, p. 301.
